q&a.title: Is there evidence that competition between hospitals creates better quality and lower cost healthcare?
q&a.summary:
There is a debate in England, as the government is changing the way the NHS works, to introduce more competition. 

The NHS will still operate as a single payer, covering the whole population: but providers such as hospitals will face more competition to a
